projects.title: Online To Do List
projects.description: Interested in my daily activites? Check out my online to do application! By leveraging the Todoist API, I've synced my activity with Todoist application so others can see what I'm up to and see cool productivity metrics.

projects.title: Obsidian Integration
projects.description: I use the Obisidian application for all my note-taking needs. All Obsidian notes are written in Markdown and integrate seamlessly with Gatby applications. Check it out!

projects.title: Graceland Today
projects.description: Graceland Today is a web dashboard for Graceland University students to see the latest campus events. It was designed in collaboration with other students and developed by yours truly. #GUTID

projects.title: Minimal Portfolio
projects.description: Minimal Portfolio is a simple portfolio template that developers can use to quickly showcase themselves and their projects.
